To us who passed through the disappointment of 1844, it seems impossible that we should ever forget the experience and the knowledge given us to 


                                                                   page 17 

establish our faith in the truths given us through the ministration of the Holy Spirit. To those who have passed through the trying tests that have come all along the years, the Lord says, "Ye are My witnesses." All who have been enlightened are to be watchful and strengthen the things that remain, those who are ready to die spiritually by reason of the false theories brought in through misapplication of the Scriptures.
